content: Hi, I'm experiencing some issues with my account. The login process keeps freezing and I'm unable to access my dashboard.
I apologize for the inconvenience. Can you please provide me with more details about when this issue started? Was it sudden or did it happen gradually?
It started a few days ago, I'm not sure if there was an update to our system that caused the problem.
I see. Can you please check your email for any updates or notifications from our company regarding this issue?
I checked my email and I didn't receive anything. However, I did find a report on our internal system that mentioned a similar issue with another user.
Okay, thank you for the information. Can you please confirm if you have any documentation or screenshots from this report?
